content.name: Gaming-FIFA
content.description: Wanna prove that your the best? then this is an opportunity to display your console skills.
rules: Only doubles matches are conducted on a knockout basis.
The teams may bring their own controllers if necessary.
The teams may choose either of the two sides.
The matchesâ€™ duration will be 4 minutes and 30 seconds. No settings shall be changed.
In case of a tiebreaker, the match proceeds to penalties.
